channel.title: Release on Newsboat Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Release on Newsboat Blog

item.title: The Single Source
item.description:
Logs are for the future you. Tell the story so you can fix it fast.

The best workflows are boring and reliable. That reliability creates room for creative work.

Defaults are where trust accumulates. Make the safest option the easiest.
